# Fabi.ai

DATA SCIENCE & AI

Fabi.ai combines SQL, Python and AI automation into one collaborative platform to help you conquer complex and ad hoc analyses, turning questions into answers.

## Fabi.ai + MotherDuck

Fabi.ai integrates with MotherDuck by allowing users to connect their smartbooks and reports directly to MotherDuck's cloud data warehouse. This integration enables users to run SQL queries on MotherDuck's DuckDB-based backend, leveraging its high-performance and efficient data analytics capabilities within Fabi's collaborative environment.
